dd_node.name: manual
dd_node.desc_cn: 手动触发消息，此节点一般用来测试
dd_node.desc_en: Manually triggering messages, this node is generally used for testing

dd_node.name: timer
dd_node.desc_cn: 此节点内部有个定时器，可以根据一定的策略（如时间间隔）触发新的消息
dd_node.desc_en: There is a timer inside this node that can trigger new messages based on certain strategies (such as time intervals)

dd_node.name: debug
dd_node.desc_cn: 支持打印接收消息的列表，可以用来跟踪调试消息流特定节点的输出消息数据
dd_node.desc_en: Support printing a list of received messages, which can be used to track and debug the output message data of specific nodes in the message flow.

dd_node.name: switch
dd_node.desc_cn: 当有输入消息时，根据一定的条件判断从哪个通道输出
dd_node.desc_en: When there is an input message, determine which channel to output from based on certain conditions

dd_node.name: js_func
dd_node.desc_cn: 此节点内部支持服务端JS代码的运行，你可以非常灵活地实现对输入消息的处理和输出消息的控制
dd_node.desc_en: This node internally supports the running of server-side JS code, allowing you to flexibly handle input messages and control output messages

dd_node.name: change
dd_node.desc_cn: 此节点 支持上下文数据的设置或交换，如你可以把消息中的数据保存到节点或流程中的变量中
dd_node.desc_en: This node supports the setting or exchange of contextual data, such as saving the data in the message to variables in the node or flow

dd_node.name: template
dd_node.desc_cn: 此节点内部支持带有{{}}的模板文本，配合消息、节点变量和流程变量进行组合，输出特定格式的消息负载数据。

dd_node.name: onoff
dd_node.desc_cn: 对输入的消息根据一定的条件判断是否通过或不通过
dd_node.desc_en: Determine whether the input message has passed or blocked based on certain conditions

dd_node.name: tag_reader
dd_node.desc_cn: 根据选择的标签和变量命名，读取当前运行项目中标签值，形成JSON数据输出
dd_node.desc_en: Based on the selected tags and variable names, read the tag values in the current running project to form JSON data output

dd_node.name: tag_writer
dd_node.desc_cn: 根据选择的写入标签和赋值方式，对标签进行写入操作。 由于标签写入可能涉及底层驱动和通信，会有一定的延迟，因此此节点还支持异步方式运行
dd_node.desc_en: Write the Tag based on the selection and assignment method. Due to the potential involvement of underlying drivers and communication in tag writing, there may be some delay, so this node also supports asynchronous running

dd_node.name: tag_filter
dd_node.desc_cn: 根据一定的过滤条件（项目树根和节点属性），读取设备实时数据（JSON格式的树形结构）
dd_node.desc_en: According to certain filtering conditions (project tree root and node attributes), read device runtime data (JSON format tree structure)

dd_node.name: tag_filter_w
dd_node.desc_cn: 节点接收特定格式的JSON数据，可以由外界决定对哪些标签进行写入操作。 节点可以设定可写标签的范围
dd_node.desc_en: Nodes receive JSON data in a specific format and can be determined by the outside world which Tags to write to. Nodes can set the range of writable Tags

dd_node.name: mem_que
dd_node.desc_cn: 节点内部有一个队列和队列监听线程，这样可以使输入消息能够快速被接收 避免一些后续节点阻塞前面节点的消息处理
dd_node.desc_en: There is a queue and queue listening thread inside the node, which allows input messages to be quickly received and avoids some subsequent nodes blocking the message processing of previous nodes

dd_node.name: tag_evt_trigger
dd_node.desc_cn: 通过选择标签中的事件配置项，监听相关标签在运行过程中值变化产生的事件，并根据一定策略产生事件消息输出
dd_node.desc_en: By selecting the event configuration item in the tag, listen for events generated by changes in the value of the relevant tag during runtime, and generate event message outputs based on certain strategies

dd_node.name: tag_rt_rdb
dd_node.desc_cn: 通过配置的关系数据表，触发所有标签实时数据的同步更新，可以为外界提供基于关系数据库表形式的实时数据查询
dd_node.desc_en: By configuring relational data table, triggering the synchronous update of real-time data for all tags, it can provide real-time data queries based on relational database tables for the outside application

dd_node.name: tag_valchg
dd_node.desc_cn: 通过选择的标签，监听标签在运行过程中值变化，并根据一定策略产生消息输出
dd_node.desc_en: By selecting a tag, listen for changes in the value of the tag during runtime, and generate message output based on a certain strategy

dd_node.name: http_client
dd_node.desc_cn: 通过特定的URL，基于Http协议访问提交请求并获取应答
dd_node.desc_en: Submit requests and obtain responses based on the HTTP protocol through specific URLs

dd_node.name: outer
dd_node.desc_cn: 外部程序根据消息流、触发名称(可为空)和消息内容参数，触发流程运行
dd_node.desc_en: External programs trigger flow execution based on message flow, trigger name (can be empty), and message content parameters

dd_node.name: on_flow_evt
dd_node.desc_cn: 流程启动、停止等事件触发相关消息。可用来流程启动前的初始化工作或流程停止时的收尾工作
dd_node.desc_en: Events such as flow start and stop trigger related messages. Can be used for initialization work before flow starting or closing work when flow stops

dd_node.name: file_r
dd_node.desc_cn: 根据设定或输入的文件路径，读取文件内容
dd_node.desc_en: Read the file content based on the set or input file path

dd_node.name: tcpc_rr
dd_node.desc_cn: 使用Tcp Client方式做请求输出和应答数据处理
dd_node.desc_en: Using Tcp Client request and handle response

dd_node.name: file_w
dd_node.desc_cn: 根据设定或输入的文件路径，写入文件内容
dd_node.desc_en: Write to file based on the set or input file path

dd_node.name: file_dir_mon
dd_node.desc_cn: 根据设定或输入的文件路径，监视文件
dd_node.desc_en: Monitor the file in dir

dd_node.name: warn_or_exceed
dd_node.name_cn: 报警或达到最大长度错误

dd_node.name: tc_rr_linkend_recv_one_break
dd_node.name_cn: 接收到一个正确响应就断开
dd_node.name_en: Disconnect upon receiving a correct response

dd_node.name: tc_rr_linkend_recv_end_mark
dd_node.name_en: Disconnect upon receiving a end mark

dd_node.name: tc_rr_linkend_recv_num_break
dd_node.name_cn: 接收到一定数量数据包就断开
dd_node.name_en: Disconnect upon receiving num of correct response

dd_node.name: tc_rr_resperr_break_link
dd_node.name_cn: 接收到错误数据包就断开
